title: CREATE_CAMERA
content:
0x5E3CF89C6BCCA67D0x5D6739AE// CreateCamera
Cam CREATE_CAMERA(Hash camHash, BOOL active);Parameters:camHash: The hash of the camera type, use GET_HASH_KEY to get the camera hash from the name.active: Set to true if you wish to make this new camera the active camera.Returns: A camera handle referencing the camera that was created.Creates a camera with the specified camera hash, You can use SET_CAM_ natives to manipulate the camera.
Make sure to call RENDER_SCRIPT_CAMS once the camera is created, or this won't have any visible effect.Take a look at CREATE_CAM if you would like to see the available camera names.NativeDB Introduced: v323Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- creates a camera with the "DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA" type
local cam = CreateCamera(GetHashKey("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA"), true)

RenderScriptCams(true, false, 0, true, true)
codeBlocks:
// CreateCamera
Cam CREATE_CAMERA(Hash camHash, BOOL active);

-- creates a camera with the "DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA" type
local cam = CreateCamera(GetHashKey("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA"), true)

RenderScriptCams(true, false, 0, true, true)
